cms.query.QueryText:
SELECT ##COLUMNS## FROM (SELECT MVTestName, MVTestDisplayName, MVTestSiteID, MVTestID, MVTestCulture, MVTestPage, MVTestOpenFrom, MVTestOpenTo, MVTestEnabled, SUM(HitsCount) AS MVTestConversions, SUM (HitsValue) AS HitsValue, MVTestMaxConversions, MVTestTargetConversionType FROM OM_MVTest JOIN Analytics_Statistics ON Analytics_Statistics.StatisticsCode LIKE 'mvtconversion;'+ MVTestName+ ';%' AND Analytics_Statistics.StatisticsSiteID = OM_MVTest.MVTestSiteID JOIN Analytics_DayHits ON Analytics_Statistics.StatisticsID = Analytics_DayHits.HitsStatisticsID WHERE HitsStartTime >= @From AND HitsEndTime <= @To GROUP BY MVTestName, MVTestDisplayName, MVTestID, MVTestCulture, MVTestPage, MVTestOpenFrom, MVTestOpenTo, MVTestEnabled, MVTestConversions, MVTestSiteID, MVTestMaxConversions, MVTestTargetConversionType
) AS X WHERE ##WHERE## ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##
